channel.title: Small Problem -.-
channel.description: Im having this problem when i made an item. i modified a picaxe, i liked the way it looked so i saved it as an .mqo i go to datmaker, i select the model that i made and it gives me this: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/2715/lolpx5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img444/lolpx5.png/1/][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/lolpx5.png/1/w204.png[/img][/URL] I click ok then the model comes up but most parts of it are missing or are transparent .... its pissing me off. HOW the hell to i get rid of this or fix it or whatever cause i spent like 5 hours on this model and now it looks like a piece of shit on the floor. thnks. if i get it to work, ill post it on these forums

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

thnks dylan, now it works. i reduced it by a little so now the only error is contains lines but that doesnt change its shape

id rep you if i couold

Read full topic

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

u reduce it by the number it gives. YOU dont reduce it the reduce option does. and youll wanna merce all objects into one. note: if ur model is over 1,500 faces, dont bother. i tried with 10,000 faces and it crashed server.

Read full topic

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

yah, it is in quads[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 12:42:04 am[/size][hr]and dyaln, the thing u said doesnt work, i tried reduccing it but i cant reduce it enought without it messing up the item

Read full topic

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

if ur item is in quads, then the datmaker halves the faces to make it triangulated, meaning its got holes in it. so yes, it does matter o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @pluh1 pluh1
item.description:
@pluh1 wrote:

It doesn’t affect the actual product, at least it didn’t for me. I just ignored it =/

Read full topic

item.title: Small Problem -.-
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

this is simple: open the model in Meta, then go Object> Reduce Polygons> OK. save it, then open in datmaker. if u have more than 1 object then u needa do it for each one.

Read full topic

i go to datmaker, i select the model that i made and it gives me this:
